item.description:
I’m organizing the 4th annual 3K/ 5K fun run at the Uconn Storrs campus on Saturday, May 4th to benefit the CT Make-A-Wish Foundation.

The event is totally noncompetitive (1 mile campus loop for walkers, 3 mile course for runners) and is a great way to meet new friends, fellow husky alum, and Jonathan XIII, Uconn’s lovable mascot. I know lots of you are from the area, but this is a great way to visit campus and see all the recently constructed buildings and Storrs Center additions.

There are a bunch of restaurants/ bars around campus if you’d like to continue the meetup after the walk!

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Uconn Campus Walk
